text.text_translated:
People see things to buy every day. They see them on social media, in magazines and in shops. So, people in Britain are buying more clothes and shoes now.

It is easy to buy things online. People can buy things without thinking. Big companies also offer very cheap clothes. So people use them like things you use once. They wear them two or three times. Then they throw them away.
